name: AnnoyingBadger
0:
”Alexa, ask Annoying Badger to wake up Robin”
”Alexa, ask Annoying Badger to wake up John”
”Alexa, launch Annoying Badger”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: annoying badger
des: Ask Alexa to wake your friend up for you. Alexa will badger your friend until there is no way he can sleep anymore.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
